references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Glide, a significant advancement in text-to-image generation that uses text-guided diffusion models, directly influencing the field's progress and inspiring further research in the area.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution image synthesis method that utilizes latent diffusion models, substantially improving the quality of generated images which is highly relevant to the study of stereotypes in T2I models.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This work presents a hierarchical text-conditional image generation method that leverages CLIP latents, offering significant improvement in image generation quality and relevance to understanding how stereotypes are encoded in T2I models.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This research introduces photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models that incorporate deep language understanding, enabling the generation of high-quality images and making the investigation of stereotypes within T2I models easier.

references.paper_title: Finetuning text-to-image diffusion models for fairness
references.reason: This paper focuses on mitigating stereotypes in text-to-image diffusion models through fine-tuning, offering a direct approach to address the issue of biases in image generation, which is the central focus of the main paper.
